                                      java.lang.String instancePath,

sets up the intent to be used on the ODK call

Parameters:
id - needed for the onActivityResult method. it's either household_id or patient_id
xml - required for editing the forms. it might be empty
formPath - path to the form to open
Returns:
Intent
